appName.description: The app name of browser extension

appDesc.message: Shortcut 'diff' search on Google for 'What is the difference between ... and ...'
appDesc.description: Just type 'diff' on url bar to search on Google. It will search on Google as 'What is the difference between ... and ...'.  example: 'diff coffee and tea'

optionTitle.message: Type 'diff' on url bar and press space or tab.
